element.name: RoundPanels
element.short: Give rounded corners to all panels within a parent control

element.name: PaintColorBand
element.short: Paint a shape and a label with a bird ring color code

element.name: LoadGlyph
element.short: Load a glyph from an image list

element.name: LoadIcone
element.short: Load a icon from an image list

element.name: LoadEditButton
element.short: Load a image to an edit button from an image list

element.name: TogglePassView
element.short: Toggle the button image to show/hide password

element.name: TryExifStringToDateTime
element.short: Try to convert an exif string to date/time
